name: Snake Dance

trigger.text: You may return 1 of your characters to its owner's hand; Return up to 1 of your opponent's Cost 5 or lower Characters to its owner's hand.

text: Counter: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters +4000 power during this battle. Then return up to 1 of your Characters to its owner's hand. Trigger: You may return 1 of your characters to its owner's hand; Return up to 1 of your opponent's Cost 5 or lower Characters to its owner's hand.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters +4000 power during this battle. Then return up to 1 of your Characters to its owner's hand.
You may return 1 of your characters to its owner's hand; Return up to 1 of your opponent's Cost 5 or lower Characters to its owner's hand.
